attributes.action: Gordon Brown MP should publically announce how much the value of the country’s gold (which he sold) would be worth now and how much he sold it for.
attributes.additional_details: Gordon Brown should tell us how much money the country recieved from his announced sale of gold while Chancellor. He should then tell us how much it is worth now. Finally, it would be nice if he gave us an honest answer to 'do you think the decision to sell when and how you did, was the right one?'.
